data.title: Matias vs Paro: Live streaming results, round by round, how to watch, start time

data.text:

Matias vs Paro: Live streaming results, round by round, how to watch, start time

Subriel Matias vs Liam Paro headlines a DAZN card tonight from Puerto Rico.

If you buy something from an SB Nation link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.

Share All sharing options for: Matias vs Paro: Live streaming results, round by round, how to watch, start time

Results:

Liam Paro UD-12 Subriel Matias (115-112, 115-112, 116-111) [Highlights and recap]

Yankiel Rivera UD-10 Victor Sandoval (98-91, 98-91, 97-92) [Highlights and recap]

Alfredo Santiago UD-10 Angel Fierro (99-91, 98-92, 98-92) [Highlights and recap]

Stephanie Pineiro UD-10 Diana Tapia (100-90, 100-90, 99-91) [Highlights and recap]

William Ortiz UD-6 Carlos Mitzael (60-52, 60-52, 59-53) [Highlights and recap]

Subriel Matias returns to the ring tonight on DAZN, headlining at home in Puerto Rico in an IBF super lightweight title defense against Australia’s Liam Paro.

Matias vs Paro will top a five-fight card from Manati starting at 7:30 pm ET. John Hansen will be handling the live coverage this evening down in the comments section.

Along with Matias vs Paro, the show features Yankiel Rivera, Angel Fierro, and others in action.

Bet on Matias vs Paro and more boxing with DraftKings Sportsbook!

Join us tonight!

Main Card (DAZN, 7:30 pm ET)

Subriel Matias (20-1, 20 KO) vs Liam Paro (24-0, 15 KO), super lightweights, 12 rounds, for Matias’ IBF title

Yankiel Rivera (5-0, 2 KO) vs Victor Sandoval (37-4, 23 KO), flyweights, 10 rounds

Angel Fierro (22-1-2, 17 KO) vs Alfredo Santiago (14-2, 6 KO), super lightweights, 10 rounds

Stephanie Pineiro (6-0, 2 KO) vs Diana Tapia (7-1, 2 KO), welterweights, 10 rounds

William Ortiz (5-0, 4 KO) vs Carlos Mitzael (6-2, 3 KO), super lightweights, 6 rounds
